title: Rovals Rapide C38 carbon wheelset gets $300 price drop and upgraded DT 370 Ratchet LN hub
content:
Roval, fresh off the release of their affordable Control Carbon mountain bike wheel, change gears back to the pavement with more carbon. Nothing sets off the performance of a bike like the wheels. Over the past couple of years, we’ve seen carbon wheel prices drop with hopes of maintaining performance. Some have flourished, and some […]

The post Rovals Rapide C38 carbon wheelset gets $300 price drop and upgraded DT 370 Ratchet LN hub appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jordan Villella
